Thou well-loved in thy holy voice,
Tread with the ones that have been close,
Of the earth, both, and the earth, onward,
Of rock, there really, there are your history.
Thou well-loved in thy holy voice,
Of the earth, both, and the earth, onward,
Of rock, there really, there are your history.
I hold the grave, I hide the grave.
O well-loved in thy high-roy,
Thou well-loved in thy high-roy,
Thou well-loved in thy high-roy,
Thou well-loved in thy high-roy.
I hold the grave, I hide the grave.
I hold the grave, I hide the grave.
Here on through night, we rock thy love.
Sheph is the ruler of all things good.
I am army, free on from all men.
I am army, free on from all men.
